mapper.insert: insert into trade_total_region_reports (id, trade_time, region_id, trade_num, trade_sum, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradeSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, trade_time, region_id, trade_num, trade_sum, created_at, updated_at from trade_total_region_reports
